channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 04:04 Air anxiety in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Citizen according to further reports.

item.title: 🟡 03:01 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region.
